title: adidas Men's Football Alphaskin Force 5 Padded Tee Tank Top
features: Climacool technology to keep you dry
Seamlessly Integrated Pads for limited distractions and supreme comfort
EVA Foam pads placed in key impact zones
Ergonomic pad shapes allow your body to move with the pads

description: Adidas Football Padded tee is perfect to crash through the line and make the play that changes the game. This five-pad tee absorbs impact and has a compression fit that locks you in for outstanding support. Built-in ventilation keeps you cool when the on-field temperature goes up. Material: 88% Polyester, 12% Spandex. Color: Black. 583TA
